about_the_game:
Bomb Vehicle is an idle-loot-rpg game that blends elements of post-apocalyptic survival, biohazard crisis, vehicle customization, and explosive action. In this game, players drive their meticulously crafted battle vehicles across the wasteland, exploring unknown territories and eliminating hordes of zombies.

The game is set in a world thrown into chaos due to an outbreak of a mysterious virus, where most humans have turned into ferocious zombies, societal structures have collapsed, and resources are extremely scarce. To survive in this new world, players must gather resources, build and upgrade their vehicles and weapons, and use them to explore the world and eliminate zombie swarms.

In Bomb Vehicle, players can:

  • Collect Vehicles: The game features a wide array of battle vehicles that can be collected through various means. Each vehicle boasts unique designs, performance characteristics, and special abilities that play crucial roles in different combat scenarios.

  • Customize Vehicles: Craft your own exclusive battle vehicle by equipping it with different engines, chips, armor, and special abilities. You can even outfit your vehicle with various turrets, from conventional machine guns to high-tech energy cannons.

  • Reinforce Vehicles: Gather materials to enhance your vehicle. In this challenging post-apocalyptic world, a meticulously enhanced vehicle will not only help you better deal with threats from zombies and other hostile forces but also allow you to progress further in the game.

  • Loot and Grow: Obtain rare equipment and materials by defeating enemies and completing quests, boosting the power of your vehicle. Every success will give you more confidence when facing greater threats.

  • Strengthen Weapons: Equipment can be enhanced and synthesized to create even more powerful gear. A carefully enhanced and advanced synthesis weapon set is key to maintaining an advantage in combat.

  • Explore the World: Traverse desolate city ruins, radiation-contaminated zones, forests, and other perilous areas in search of valuable supplies and potential allies. Each region is filled with challenges and opportunities waiting for brave explorers to uncover.

  • Combat and Survival: Confront hordes of zombies and other adversaries, using your wisdom and tactical advantages to win battles. Properly configure your vehicle setup to ensure combat readiness under any circumstances.

  • Continuously Unlocked New Combat Enhancement Modules: Such as Brain Slurry Amplifier, Brainwave Disruptor, Z Virus, Support Bomber... These will provide significant boosts to your battles.

Bomb Vehicle not only tests players' strategic planning and decision-making abilities but also offers an imaginative game world that immerses players in the intense and thrilling adventures of a post-apocalyptic setting. As the game progresses, more secrets will be uncovered, more abilities will be unlocked, and new challenges will continue to emerge.
